title: COVID-19 Vaccines and Testing - To Help Everyone Health and Wellness Centers
author: Admin
sitename: To Help Everyone Health and Wellness Centers
cleaned_text: as follows: Tuesdays from 8:30AM to 4:30PM WHERE: T.H.E. Western Health Center, 3834 S. Western Avenue, Los Angeles CA 90062 - Google Map: [Western Health Center](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//3834+S+Western+Ave+Los+Angeles,+CA+90062+USA/@34.0161154,-118.3086651,16z/data=!4m8!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x80c2b80481615da7:0xbee1d102d05e0d1f!2m2!1d-118.3086651!2d34.0161154) Moderna vaccines for: - Ages: six months and older - 1st, 2nd doses - Booster doses 16+ Thursdays from 8:30AM to 12:30PM WHERE: T.H.E. La Brea Health Center, 3721 S. La Brea Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90016 - Google Map: [La Brea Health Center](https://goo.gl/maps/zbMUHNWCZc13speo6) Pfizer vaccines for: - Ages: six months and older - 1st, 2nd doses - Booster doses 12+ Children ages 6 months and older can now get vaccinated against COVID-19. If your child is receiving the Moderna or Pfizer vaccine, here is when to schedule the doses. To learn more about the vaccines, talk to your child's doctor or visit [MyTurn.ca.gov.](http://myturn.ca.gov/) You do not have to be a patient at T.H.E. to receive a vaccine here. No I.D. required. No health insurance required. Appointments recommended. Walk-ins welcome. Free transportation available on request. Get a free At-Home test when you get your COVID-19 vaccine or booster at T.H.E. Call [323-730-1920](tel:3237301920) option 3 to schedule an appointment.
